response.overview: Hubert Geral has been appointed Master of Ceremonies by a man who organizes orgies and has such a big penis that he can't make it with women and so only watches. Hubert's wife wishes she could try that man and both husband and wife celebrate the opportunity in the bathroom. In the next room, his sister masturbates while watching and listening to them. She contacts the man (who will be called The Master from now on) by phone to take part in his orgies and meet him. He warns her he's bearded and limps. They meet.
response.title: Elles en veulent
